project.name: C-C663A-SUBV-04-ST03-DT01-DF12-CF02-01
project.description: Creating test case using base program. Added a Socket Server to accept communication from untrusted source. Completed injection.

iopair.name: C-C663A-SUBV-04-ST03-DT01-DF12-CF02-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: create a repository This weakness expects a string in the form: '<qsize> <data>' where qsize is the size of the quick sort (used to delay execution), and data is a string containing no spaces. It creates two threads which both enter a non-reentrant function and increment a static counter. This causes a buffer overflow which will overwrite the free() struct causing an error when free() is called. In order to overwrite the free() struct, qsize >= 500000 and the input string must be 14+ char long.

process.script: /opt/stonesoup/workspace/scripts/service_mon.sh ss-localhost 8887 && curl -v --data-urlencode data="3 hephalump" --header "If-Match: weak_taint_source_value" --request POST --no-buffer --output /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/logfile.txt --silent --show-error http://ss-localhost:8887

scoring_formula.formula: STDOUT AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT

iopair.name: C-C663A-SUBV-04-ST03-DT01-DF12-CF02-01-GOOD-02
iopair.description: commit a file This weakness expects a string in the form: '<qsize> <data>' where qsize is the size of the quick sort (used to delay execution), and data is a string containing no spaces. It creates two threads which both enter a non-reentrant function and increment a static counter. This causes a buffer overflow which will overwrite the free() struct causing an error when free() is called. In order to overwrite the free() struct, qsize >= 500000 and the input string must be 14+ char long.

process.script: cd ../good-02 && cp file.txt stonesoup && cd stonesoup && $SS_TC_DEPS/bin/svn add file.txt

/opt/stonesoup/workspace/scripts/service_mon.sh ss-localhost 8887 && curl -v --data-urlencode data="1 Sniffles_and_whiffles,_yo." --header "If-Match: weak_taint_source_value" --request POST --no-buffer --output /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/logfile.txt --silent --show-error http://ss-localhost:8887

scoring_formula.formula: CHECKOUT AND ADD AND COMMIT AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT
